channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Used to be really good at this but then I got bored so I went to cod hacking and now i'm bored of that so i've decided to come back :) But the problem is I have forgotten loads of stuff so i will need some help :)
Where do I change the color for this yell tag [code]}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Downhunter")){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=f0f0>[The Don]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code] Thanks for any help :)
